headers.value: default-src 'self'; img-src 'self' data: https: https://maps.googleapis.com https://maps.gstatic.com; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://maps.googleapis.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; frame-src 'self' https://www.google.com https://maps.embed.googleusercontent.com; connect-src 'self' https: https://maps.googleapis.com;
